task.title: Save Screenshots
task.shortdesc: How to save screenshots outside of Snagit Editor's library.

context.p: Snagit Editor automatically saves your captured screenshots as SNAGX files in its library. You should save them to an appropriate location on your computer if you want a traditional image file.

step.cmd: Browse to where you want to save the image.
Type in a descriptive name in the File name field.
Select PNG from the Save as type field.

taskbody.result: Your screenshot is now accessible outside of Snagit Editor.
